Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the New York state first home savings program to authorize first time home buyers to establish savings accounts to buy their first home
Summary: Establishes the New York state first home savings program to authorize first time home buyers to establish savings accounts to buy their first home.
LawCode: Add Art 28 §§1250 - 1256, Priv Hous Fin L; amd §612, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state first home savings program, which authorizes first time home buyers to establish savings accounts to purchase a home; and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a personal income tax deduction for deposits into such accounts
